name: Love Island: All Stars
overview: Some of your favourite Islanders from across the years heading back to the stunning South African villa to once again 'graft' as their search for love continues.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Maya Jama is a shoulder to cry on as a group of Love Island All Stars return to paradise for the first time ever... ALL hoping that they can find romance the second time around.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: As the flirtfest continues, everyone wants to talk to Mollie, but Jake struggles to find his place in the Villa.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Oh we've got some twists and turns in store from the Villa today as the gang find their feet - let's just say you'd better be prepared to expect the unexpected in paradise.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Things are heating up nicely as the series continues - as the Love Island All Stars settle into Villa life, they're learning that no two days are ever the same in paradise.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: A red-hot first week for the Love Island All Stars should have reminded them that the path to true love never runs smoothly... and especially so the second time around.

episodes.name: Unseen Bits #1
episodes.overview: Join Iain Stirling for all the best unaired bits direct from paradise.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: No girl is safe with the arrival of new Bombshell Arabella, especially as most of the boys seem to think they're still single. And what's the history with Toby and Arabella?!

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Sparks are flying between Callum and one beauty, plus Georgia H needs headspace - could there be trouble in paradise? Oh, and is that Maya back in the Villa with huge shock twist?!

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: It's a day for big chats, a barney over Georgia S, and a long walk to the terrace. Plus, some very daring balloon action. Steamy snog, anyone?!

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: So after Hannah made quite the impression on Tyler, could they be getting on on another level? And let's just say there's double trouble with the arrival of TWO new Bombshells...

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: Bombshell Sophie's arrival is causing one guy's head to spin. Tune in to witness some secret hand holding, a bro code getting broken (or is it?), and a SHOCK text arriving.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Chris is toying with his emotions biiig time, there's talk about love languages, and Sophie's stuck in the middle. Plus, someone plans to be brutal in a twisty Truth or Dare game.

episodes.name: Unseen Bits #2
episodes.overview: It's that time again - all the naughtiest, funniest and unbelievable unseen bits from the Love Island All Stars.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: It's getting hot out here! There’s a game of Truth or Dare between Tom and Georgia S, two lovers head to the hideaway, and two more prepare for a first date. Turn up the steam!

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: Sadly, it's time for two former lovebirds to call it a day, but it does mean one of them can make a move on one of the other Islanders! And who's ready for some Snog, Marry, Pie?

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: Josh and Chris become detectives as they uncover a revelation, Molly feels like a total mug, and Maya makes a surprise show to share some news - but what are the consequences?!

episodes.name: Episode 17
episodes.overview: The Islanders now have a SUPER important decision to make. As decisions are being made around the firepit, who arrives but... hang on, is this another Bombshell?!

episodes.name: Episode 18
episodes.overview: Two Islanders decide to rehash their history, but has their ship sailed? There's a ghostly game of Never Have I Ever and a very rocky recoupling around the firepit.

episodes.name: Episode 19
episodes.overview: It's getting hotter by the minute as our gorgeous Islanders are having a winter they'll never forget, but they all know that there are plenty more twists and turns to come.

episodes.name: Unseen Bits #3
episodes.overview: You think you've seen it all - well, guess what, there's MORE goss. Strap in for another jam-packed edition of exclusive unseen moments from the nation's favourite Villa.

episodes.name: Episode 21
episodes.overview: Callum’s frustrated - just give the man some answers! Two former lovers rekindle their connection, plus it’s time for an ALL-STAR awards ceremony!

episodes.name: Episode 22
episodes.overview: The fallout from The PDAs rumbles through the Villa. Plus: is one girl a risk taker? Can she and a potential new lover get away with secret shenanigans on the terrace?!

episodes.name: Episode 23
episodes.overview: Bring on the games as anything could happen with three blonde Bombshells stepping into the Villa - with NONE of them holding back! Plus: is someone hot for Molly?!

episodes.name: Episode 24
episodes.overview: It’s time for the Islanders to get glam because there's a special performance coming up... Plus: who's the guy with the jokey personality who's being a bit too much of a showman?

episodes.name: Episode 25
episodes.overview: One lucky couple is getting a treat tonight, but who will it be?! While we're thinking about couples, which do you think has the least sexual chemistry?! Oh, and hi there, Maya!

episodes.name: Episode 26
episodes.overview: One lucky couple is getting a treat tonight, but who will it be?! While we're thinking about couples, which do you think has the least sexual chemistry?! Oh, and hi there, Maya!

episodes.name: Unseen Bits #5
episodes.overview: They flirted, they argued, they fell in love and quickly out of it again, and now it's your chance to see the last Unseen Bits of the series before the Grand Finale. Get in!

episodes.name: Episode 35
episodes.overview: After a turbulent 24 hours, Anton needs someone to confide in - who will he reach out to? Then, in an epic turn of events, there's a Love Island first as... ooh, what, what?!
